title: So someone is going around Facebook and sending these messages.
body:
"Hi, im John Trollston with riot games and we have been informed that you have been using commands in online games to gain benefits in game, we are currently in review of terminating your account pending a review of reports, it seems that you have had over 50 reports of using commands or "hacks" and we are confident that these reports are not false, if u have any evidence to help your case, return a message before your account gets terminated
We might have other members of the enforcement team contact you in an effort to get your opinion on the situation before we terminate your account"

replies.body: This sounds like a really awful phishing attempt.  If an account ever receives a suspension, you would receive an email to the registered account and not through social media.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and grab some screenshots so we can investigate these further.  Thanks for the heads up!
